member.name: CHANGER_MOVE_MEDIUM
member.summary: Contains information that theIOCTL_CHANGER_MOVE_MEDIUM control code uses to move a piece of media to a destination.

member.name: CHANGER_MOVE_MEDIUM.Transport
member.summary: A structure that indicates which transport element to use for the move operation.

member.name: CHANGER_MOVE_MEDIUM.Source
member.summary: A structure that indicates the element that contains the media that is to be moved.

member.name: CHANGER_MOVE_MEDIUM.Destination
member.summary: A structure that indicates the element that is the destination of the media originally at Source.

member.name: CHANGER_MOVE_MEDIUM.Flip
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, the media should be flipped. Otherwise, it should not. This member is valid only if the Features0 member of the structure is CHANGER_MEDIUM_FLIP.
